DESCRIPTION:
WARNING: This cog is only meant as an example. Please do not turn this on in the Red-DiscordBot server. It's more complicated now cause of the per-server toggle, but the spam was annoying, so...

This cog demonstrates:
 1. on_message listeners
 2. file reading/writing both json and non-json
 3. simple aiohttp example
 4. normal settings usage / enabling behavior per-server
NAME: simple example cog for on_message listeners/triggers
